mutants.code:
def find_longest_substring_with_vowel_and_digit(s):
    vowels = set('aeiouAEIOU')
    digits = set('0123456789')
    start = 1
    end = 0
    unique_chars = set()
    max_length = 0
    max_vowel_digit_length = 0
    while end < len(s):
        char = s[end]
        if char not in unique_chars:
            unique_chars.add(char)
            end += 1
            length = end - start
            if length > max_length:
                max_length = length
                if any((char in vowels for char in unique_chars)) and any((char in digits for char in unique_chars)):
                    max_vowel_digit_length = max_length
        else:
            unique_chars.remove(s[start])
            start += 1
    return max_vowel_digit_length

            unique_chars.remove(s[start])
            start += -1
    return max_vowel_digit_length

def find_longest_substring_with_vowel_and_digit(s):
    vowels = set('aeiouAEIOU')
    digits = set('0123456789')
    start = 0
    end = 0
    unique_chars = set()
    max_length = 0
    max_vowel_digit_length = 0
    while end < len(s):
        char = s[end]
        if char not in unique_chars:
            unique_chars.add(char)
            end += 1
            length = end - start
            if length > max_length:
                max_length = length
                if any((char in vowels for char in unique_chars)) and any((char not in digits for char in unique_chars)):
                    max_vowel_digit_length = max_length
        else:
            unique_chars.remove(s[start])
            start += 1
    return max_vowel_digit_length
